Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole

programme.title: Oliver & Company
programme.desc: An orphaned kitten abandoned on the streets of New York is given shelter by a gang of canine thieves and their penniless owner, who is struggling to pay his debts to a brutal thug. Later, the kitten meets a kindly little girl and he thinks he has finally found a new home - but ends up leading her into danger. Animated adventure inspired by Oliver Twist, with the voices of Joey Lawrence, Billy Joel and Bette Midler

programme.title: Piper
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated Pixar short, directed by Alan Barillaro. A mother bird tries to teach her little one how to find food for herself, but encounters a traumatic experience

programme.title: My Favorite Martian
programme.desc: A TV journalist meets a stranded alien who is trying to repair his crashed spacecraft. After first planning to exploit the chance of a big story, he instead offers his help after befriending the visitor - but a fellow reporter plans to expose the truth. Sci-fi comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Christopher Lloyd, Jeff Daniels, Elizabeth Hurley and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha(n)

programme.title: Lava
programme.desc: James Ford Murphy's musical short following the love story of two ocean volcanoes, Uku and Lele, over millions of years. Animation, featuring the voices of Kuana Torres Kahele and Napua Makua(n)

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure(n)

programme.title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
programme.desc: The Arabian adventurer prepares to marry his beloved Jasmine, but gets distracted by a gang of robbers who have stolen a powerful magical artefact, as well as the news that his long-lost father is still alive. Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger, Linda Larkin and John Rhys-Davies(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi(n)

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: A man raised by gorillas in the jungle has his first encounter with humans in the form of a scientist and his daughter, and is torn between remaining among the apes or rediscovering his roots. He must also fight to defend his animal friends from a big-game hunter. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tony Goldwyn and Minnie Driver(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
programme.desc: A single-minded American golfer's determination helps him to overcome the sport's class prejudice against his working-class background and his father's cynicism for the chance to test his skills against his idol in the 1913 US Open. Fact-based drama directed by Bill Paxton, starring Shia LaBeouf, Stephen Dillane, Elias Koteas and Josh Flitter(n)

programme.title: White Fang 2: The Myth of the White Wolf
programme.desc: A white boy races to the aid of Native Americans with the help of his fearless hound, in a bid to prevent their sacred tribal ground being taken over by miners. Adventure sequel set during the Alaskan Gold Rush, and inspired by Jack London's novel, starring Scott Bairstow, Alfred Molina, Charmaine Craig and Geoffrey Lewis(n)

programme.title: Dennis
programme.desc: A well-meaning little boy with an inability to stay out of trouble is the bane of his curmudgeonly neighbour, Mr Wilson. But when a thief steals Wilson's coin collection, the tiny terror seizes the chance to make amends and come to the rescue. Slapstick comedy based on the comic strip, starring Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright, Christopher Lloyd and Lea Thompson

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack

programme.title: The Jungle Book: Special
programme.desc: The making of Jon Favreau's reimagining of the Disney classic, featuring the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Scarlett Johanssen

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: The mischievous son of the US president drives his personal bodyguard to a breakdown with his wild ways. Luckily, the secret service man's muscular replacement is made of sterner stuff - and his refusal to give in to the lad's trickery soon leads to a grudging respect between the two. Disney comedy, starring Sinbad, Brock Pierce, Robert Guillaume, Timothy Busfield and Zachary Ty Bryan

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee

programme.title: Animal Kingdom: Let's Go Ape
programme.desc: A primate king's outcast son eventually comes into his own, learning how to run on two legs and the secrets of fire. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ben Bishop, Anjella Mackintosh and Geoff Searle

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny

Disney comedy, starring Sinbad, Brock Pierce, Robert Guillaume, Timothy Busfield and Zachary Ty Bryan

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left in the temporary care of a friend when their owners are forced to move away. Thinking they have been abandoned, the trio hit the road in a bid to find their way home. Adventure, featuring the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Don Ameche. Kim Greist, Robert Hays and Benj Thall take the human roles

programme.title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left to fend for themselves on the streets of San Francisco when their owners fly off on holiday and accidentally leave them behind. As they join a tough group of strays, they must avoid falling into the clutches of the sinister dog catchers. Adventure sequel, with the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Ralph Waite

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A teenager with a promising academic future causes consternation for her family when she sets her sights on becoming a professional ice skater. Luckily, a former champion of the sport is on hand to offer training and advice. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Trachtenberg, Kim Cattrall, Joan Cusack and Hayden Panettiere, alongside a host of professional skaters

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly

programme.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left in the temporary care of a friend when their owners are forced to move away. Thinking they have been abandoned, the trio hit the road in a bid to find their way home. Adventure, featuring the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Don Ameche. Kim Greist, Robert Hays and Benj Thall take the human roles

programme.title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left to fend for themselves on the streets of San Francisco when their owners fly off on holiday and accidentally leave them behind. As they join a tough group of strays, they must avoid falling into the clutches of the sinister dog catchers. Adventure sequel, with the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Ralph Waite

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A teenager with a promising academic future causes consternation for her family when she sets her sights on becoming a professional ice skater. Luckily, a former champion of the sport is on hand to offer training and advice. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Trachtenberg, Kim Cattrall, Joan Cusack and Hayden Panettiere, alongside a host of professional skaters(n)

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid fleeing an arranged marriage becomes stranded at a beach resort. There she meets two local girls - lifelong friends about to be separated when one of them moves to Australia - and seeks their help in winning the heart of a lifeguard she has fallen for. In return, she promises to grant them their wish to stay together. Fantasy comedy, with Sara Paxton, Emma Roberts and Joanna Levesque(n)

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: Zootropolis: Special
programme.desc: The making of Disney's animated buddy-cop comedy set in a world entirely populated by animals(n)

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell(n)

programme.title: Capture the Flag
programme.desc: A young surfer and his friends try to prevent a devious plan to change the course of history when a ruthless billionaire sets out to stop the moon landings from happening, so that he can gain control of a valuable energy source. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Sam Fink, Phillipa Alexander and Lorraine Pilkington(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua 2
programme.desc: A canine couple adjusting to parenthood with a litter of five puppies discover their owner's parents face losing their home. They leap into action to help their human friends, hatching a plan to raise the money needed by robbing banks and competing in dog shows. Comedy, starring Marcus Coloma, with the voices of Odette Annable and George Lopez(n)

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell(n)

programme.title: Capture the Flag
programme.desc: A young surfer and his friends try to prevent a devious plan to change the course of history when a ruthless billionaire sets out to stop the moon landings from happening, so that he can gain control of a valuable energy source. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Sam Fink, Phillipa Alexander and Lorraine Pilkington(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua 2
programme.desc: A canine couple adjusting to parenthood with a litter of five puppies discover their owner's parents face losing their home. They leap into action to help their human friends, hatching a plan to raise the money needed by robbing banks and competing in dog shows. Comedy, starring Marcus Coloma, with the voices of Odette Annable and George Lopez(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: Jimmy Vickers, a rogue SAS officer specialising in interrogation techniques, sets out to take vengeance on the criminal gang that murdered his parents. However, his brutal crusade is placed in jeopardy when it becomes clear the police have teamed up with members of his old unit to stop him completing his mission. Action thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Roxanne McKee and Vincent Regan

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: An unstable Vietnam veteran cop teams up with a by-the-book Los Angeles police detective to investigate the apparent suicide of the daughter of a wealthy businessman, leading them to a violent and bloody confrontation with a ruthless drug cartel under the control of a retired US general. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan and Tom Atkins

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace

programme.title: The Smuggler
programme.desc: The police intercept a suspected drugs mule they believe has swallowed condoms filled with heroin on his re-entry to his native Australia. He can only be charged after the illicit substance is ejected by his body - so he spends the next week incarcerated with the authorities keeping an eye on his every movement. Comedy drama, starring Hugo Weaving, Angus Sampson and Leigh Whannell

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Headstrong cop Martin Riggs and his cautious partner Roger Murtaugh stumble across a plot by a South African diplomat to launder drugs money by shipping gold coins into the US via his embassy. Protected by diplomatic immunity, the crook looks certain to evade the law - while his chief henchman has a connection to Riggs' traumatic past. Action thriller sequel, with Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland, Derrick O'Connor and Patsy Kensit

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff(n)

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: A suicidal artist drives into the desert seeking solitude, hoping to find some meaning in his shallow life. He meets a mysterious drifter who throws his life off course, and must find a way to conquer his depression in order to protect the things he cares about. Thriller, starring Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster(n)

programme.title: Mercury Plains
programme.desc: A troubled teenager runs away from home and crosses the border into Mexico. He is recruited by a mysterious paramilitary organisation, that battles against drug cartels, supposedly in the pursuit of law and order, while actually stealing from the criminals. As the group's actions grow more violent, he searches for a way to escape with his life. Action adventure, starring Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan and Andy Garcia(n)

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: A plane carrying a college rugby team smashes into a mountain in the Andes, leaving the survivors stranded in unbearably bleak conditions. As supplies dwindle, they are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating their dead to ensure they make it through the ordeal. Fact-based drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano and Josh Hamilton(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts(n)

programme.title: Manson
programme.desc: Biopic of the cult leader, following the establishment of his `family' of followers in 1960s California. Manson exerts a powerful influence over the people who came to him, and fuelled by delusions of an inevitable coming race war, he ultimately compelled them to commit a series of brutal murders on his behalf. Starring Ryan Kiser and Reid Warner(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Black
programme.desc: Premiere. Mavela, a 15-year-old in Brussels gang The Black Bronx, must choose between love and loyalty when she falls for Marwan, a Moroccan boy from rival group the 1080s. Drama, starring Martha Canga Antonio, Aboubakr Bensaihi and Sanaa Alaoui

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged

programme.title: Heaven Knows, Mr Allison
programme.desc: A US marine corporal stationed on a South Pacific island and a novice nun on a mission are forced into the hills when Japanese forces arrive and set up military bases during the Second World War. Before long the pair develop strong emotional ties, but in resisting their feelings for each other the relationship becomes one of deep mutual respect. Romantic drama, written and directed by John Huston, with Robert Mitchum and Deborah Kerr

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A princess tires of a tour of European capitals and runs away from her entourage while in Rome. An American newspaper reporter takes her under his wing in the hope of getting an exclusive, but as he shows her the sights of the city, he starts to fall in love with her. Romantic comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, Gregory Peck, Eddie Albert and Harcourt Williams

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced New York Times reporter discovers that an accused killer has assumed his identity, and the resulting investigation turns into a game of cat and mouse. Fact-based drama, starring Jonah Hill, James Franco and Felicity Jones

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander

programme.title: Just Jim
programme.desc: A Welsh teenager leads a lonely life after being rejected by his only friend. He becomes fascinated by a mysterious American who moves in next door, and the new arrival offers him some advice on how to be cool. The youngster starts to develop the life he had always longed for, but begins to wonder if he was happier the way he used to be. Comedy drama, starring Emile Hirsch and Craig Roberts

programme.title: Things To Come
programme.desc: A high-school philosophy teacher is forced to re-examine her life when her husband leaves her for another woman. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert, Andre Marcon and Roman Kolinka

programme.title: Valley of Love
programme.desc: An estranged couple meet for the first time in years in Death Valley, California, having responded to a message left for them by their dead son, who committed suicide six months previously. They are instructed to visit a series of locations in the desert, with the promise that their son's ghost will appear to them. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu. In French and English

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A German tank commander is assigned to lead a surprise counter-attack against Allied forces as part of a last-ditch attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War and prevent the invasion of his country. An American intelligence officer realises what the enemy is planning, and tries to convince his superiors that they are facing a major offensive. Drama, starring Robert Shaw, Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Telly Savalas and Charles Bronson

programme.title: Warsaw 44
programme.desc: A factory worker in Nazi occupied Poland joins a resistance movement. He finds himself torn between two very different women, but all three of them will be drawn into a growing conflict as the approach of the Soviet army inspires the rebels to launch a climactic battle against their oppressors. Second World War drama, starring Jozef Pawlowski and Zofia Wichlacz. In Polish and German

programme.title: Battle for Sevastopol
programme.desc: A female Russian student becomes an expert sniper during the Second World War, regarded as a hero by her own people and a deadly threat by the German high command. In the later years of the war, she travels to the US, befriending Eleanor Roosevelt and spearheading a campaign to persuade America to join the Allies. Fact-based drama, starring Yuliya Peresild and Evgeniy Tsyganov. In Russian and English

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama chronicling the planning and execution of the Allied landings in Normandy on June 6, 1944, from the differing perspectives of the British, German and American forces. Starring Richard Burton, Richard Todd, Kenneth More, John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, Henry Fonda and Curt Jurgens

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: A TV news producer prepares an investigation into then presidential candidate George W Bush's military service record, examining allegations that he exploited family connections to avoid being sent to Vietnam and failed to fulfil basic responsibilities as a member of the National Guard. The report proves controversial, and places her career under attack when key evidence is denounced as a forgery. Fact-based drama, starring Cate Blanchett and Robert Redford

programme.title: Hungry Hearts
programme.desc: Premiere. A young mother becomes irrationally and dangerously fixated with her baby's health. Psychological drama, starring Adam Driver, Alba Rohrwacher and Roberta Maxwell(n)

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees(n)

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese(n)

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
programme.desc: A reckless singing pilot joins a friend in Hawaii, where they plan to go into business together running chartered helicopter flights. However, his irresponsible nature, tangled love life and dangerous flying threaten to ruin their enterprise. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, James Shigeta and Suzanna Leigh(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic of Notorious BIG, whose rise to fame took him from being a Brooklyn street hustler and crack dealer to become a respected and influential rap artist, before he was brutally murdered at the age of 24. Starring Jamal Woolard, Derek Luke, Dennis LA White and Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian(n)

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson(n)

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: A cop infiltrates the inner circle of a feared Boston mobster, unaware a fellow officer is already an informant on the gangster's payroll. When both the crooks and the police discover they have a mole in their ranks, the two detectives realise they are in sudden danger and try to expose each other. Martin Scorsese's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg, Martin Sheen and Alec Baldwin(n)

programme.title: Rust and Bone
programme.desc: A single father raising a five-year-old son he barely knows gets a job as a nightclub bouncer, where he becomes fascinated with an aloof killer whale trainer at a marine park. When she loses her legs in a tragic accident, she turns to him for support and a powerful bond develops between them. Romantic drama, starring Marion Cotillard and Matthias Schoenaerts. In French and English

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees
programme.desc: Construction workers battle against Japanese forces while working with the US navy in the South Pacific during the Second World War, while the head of the company and an officer compete for the affections of a local woman. However, when one recklessly causes a tragedy, he seeks redemption by launching an attack on a tank battalion. Drama, starring John Wayne, Susan Hayward and Dennis O'Keefe

programme.title: Doctor Dolittle
programme.desc: A Victorian veterinary surgeon is certified insane after developing the ability to talk to his patients in their own language. Undaunted, he manages to escape from the asylum and embarks on a quest to locate a rare aquatic snail. Oscar-winning musical comedy, with Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Richard Attenborough and Anthony Newley. Songs include Talk to the Animals and I've Never Seen Anything Like It

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Feisty heroine Annie and her new boyfriend Alex take a cruise in the Bahamas, but the trip becomes a nightmare when they discover a vengeful computer genius - a former employee laid off because of his terminal illness - is also on board. He has secretly programmed the ship to crash into an oil tanker while he steals a cache of diamonds from the cargo. Action thriller sequel, with Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Premiere. An expert takes a contract from the CIA to test a maximum security prison by trying to break out of it , but he soon discovers he has been duped and that his captors intend him to stay inside forever. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger

A British soldier deployed to Belfast in 1971, almost immediately finds himself caught up in a riot. In the aftermath, he becomes separated from the rest of his unit. Lost and alone at night in a hostile and unfamiliar area, he makes a disturbing journey in search of safety. Thriller, starring Jack O'Connell and Richard Dormer

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: Flying Tigers
programme.desc: An American pilot leads a squadron of volunteer aviators to help China's fledgling air force fight the Japanese during the Second World War. However, he has to contend with the consequences when the actions of an arrogant hotshot pilot lead to the death of a fellow veteran airman. Drama, starring John Wayne, John Carroll, Anna Lee and Paul Kelly

programme.title: Carry On Nurse
programme.desc: The patients on the men's ward of Haven Hospital cause more mayhem for the staff than the rest of the hospital combined, forcing the management to send in a formidable matron to control the situation. Feeling aggrieved by her no-nonsense methods, the chaps decide the time is right to get their own back. Comedy, with Kenneth Williams, Hattie Jacques, Joan Sims, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey, Shirley Eaton and Leslie Phillips

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull

programme.title: D-Day, the Sixth of June
programme.desc: A British colonel and an American captain board a ship heading out on a dangerous mission as part of the Normandy Landings. As the two men prepare for the battle to come, they both reminisce about their love for the same woman. Second World War drama, starring Robert Taylor, Richard Todd, Dana Wynter and Edmond O'Brien

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The relentless Mexican mercenary is hired by the president of the United States for a vitally important mission. A billionaire arms dealer intends to start a nuclear war using a space-based weapon of mass destruction, but defeating his schemes involves a deadly encounter with a murderous master of disguise. Action thriller sequel, starring Danny Trejo and Mel Gibson

programme.title: Heli
programme.desc: An honest man struggles to make ends meet legally in a dangerous town on the Mexican border with the US. He has to protect his family from a drug cartel after his 12-year-old sister begins a relationship with a police cadet, whose corruption brings the gangsters' wrath down on the family. Crime drama, starring Armando Espitia and Andrea Vergara. In Spanish(n)

programme.title: The Great Sioux Uprising
programme.desc: A gang of rustlers anger the local Sioux tribe by stealing their horses and selling them to a nearby Army outpost - and as the braves gear up for a war, only one man can prevent a massacre. Western adventure, starring Jeff Chandler, Faith Domergue, Lyle Bettger and Peter Whitney(n)

programme.title: Harvey
programme.desc: An amiable drunk claims to have a six-foot invisible rabbit named Harvey as a friend, to the horror of his social-climbing sister. Having been embarrassed by her brother once too often, she tries to have him committed to an asylum, but things do not go according to plan as her sibling's gentle nature wins over those around him. Comedy, starring James Stewart and Josephine Hull(n)

programme.title: Damn the Defiant
programme.desc: The commander of a British warship fighting in the Napoleonic campaign faces bitter opposition from his right-hand man, a cruel and sadistic officer hated by the crew. In a battle of wills between the pair, the captain's second-in-command tries to provoke his leader's wrath by tormenting his son, an officer on the vessel. Drama, starring Alec Guinness, Dirk Bogarde and Anthony Quayle(n)

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Second World War comedy, with Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully(n)

programme.title: Letters to Juliet
programme.desc: A writer on holiday in Italy discovers a 50-year-old letter from a woman describing her regret at rejecting a man she was in love with. She is moved to reply, prompting the writer to turn up in person with her grandson in tow, and together they set out in search of her lost love to put things right. Romantic drama, starring Amanda Seyfried, Vanessa Redgrave and Gael Garcia Bernal(n)

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: In the future, all human activity is performed by robot duplicates mentally controlled by their owners, who live lives of complete isolation. As a mysterious killer begins murdering both humans and their doubles, an FBI agent ventures into the real world for the first time in years to catch the criminal. Sci-fi thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Radha Mitchell(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: Eight oil rig workers end up stranded in the middle of the Alaskan tundra when the plane flying them home crashes. With limited supplies, they must make a gruelling journey across the icy wilderness to civilisation, but their situation is made more perilous when a pack of ferocious wolves begins stalking them. Adventure, starring Liam Neeson, Frank Grillo and Dermot Mulroney(n)

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie and Potsie decide to club together and buy a car for the purpose of impressing two girls. Nostalgic American sitcom with the Fonz and friends

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is sent to report on the landing of the Hindenburg, but is traumatised when he witnesses its destruction and the deaths of many passengers

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason falls in love with Curt's sister, and neglects his studies to help her develop her musical talents. However, the relationship does not end well

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: As word of a new railway station spreads, Walnut Grove residents look forward to the start of building work - until they learn the true cost of the plan

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Isaiah falls in love with a blind girl who is much younger than him. When she undergoes treatment to restore her sight, he fears she will reject him when she sees how old he is

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: Conclusion of the rock 'n' roll biopic, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as the much-loved performer. Following his varied film career and the rise of pop music, Elvis stages a comeback, but his reliance on drugs intensifies as the demands of fame take hold. With Rose McGowan and Randy Quaid

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help an Asian woman whose family have recently arrived in America to protect them from racial prejudice

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan work as hotel bellhops to help a millionaire's son dubbed Rudd the Dud find meaning in his life. They must also contend with a tyrannical boss and snooty guests

programme.title: The War Bride
programme.desc: A cockney seamstress marries a Canadian serviceman after a whirlwind romance in London during the Second World War. She is sent to live with his family on their farm in a backwater of Alberta until the conflict is over, but she struggles to get along with her dour in-laws, who make no attempt to welcome her. Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young

programme.title: The Children Nobody Wanted
programme.desc: A man saddened by the plight of orphaned children resolves to do all he can to relieve their suffering, so sets out to become the first unmarried foster parent in America. Fact-based drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Frederic Lehne, Noble Willingham and Matt Clark

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student Dr David Spencer and they start planning the wedding. However, her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for new town doctor Curtis Willard, and she begins to have second thoughts

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. After receiving an inheritance, the town council plans to open a new school for the blind

programme.title: Beverly Hills Christmas
programme.desc: A spoiled, rich teenager is given a lesson in the true meaning of Christmas when she is visited by a guardian angel, who tries to teach her that true value is found in assisting others, and not in material things. Festive drama, starring Donna Spangler, Dean Cain and Simona Fusco

programme.title: A Carol Christmas
programme.desc: A self-interested TV talk-show host with heaps of money and a bad attitude vows to pull out all the stops to ensure she avoids any hint of seasonal goodwill, a plan that falls to pieces when three ghosts pay her an unscheduled visit to teach her a lesson. Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part one of three. Drama following the lives and loves of a family shattered by hatred during one of the most turbulent periods in history, the 1930s. Starring Lucy Gutteridge, Courteney Cox and Mia Sara

programme.title: North and South
programme.sub-title: North and South: Book II: Love and War.
programme.desc: Romantic drama, based on the novel by John Jakes set during the American Civil War, which sees a moral wedge driven between two life-long friends as their country is torn apart

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma is admitted to hospital, but Grandpa does not cope well with being away from her. Corabeth thinks Elizabeth is a bad influence on Aimee, and forbids them from being friends

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Baldwin sisters' niece returns to America after living in Germany, and John Boy suspects she is running away from something terrible that happened there

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A handsome minister comes to Walnut Grove and causes a stir when he begins secret meeting with the town's women secretly - especially as Almanzo and John are away on business

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Jenny is paralysed in an accident, but hope arrives in the form of an elderly doctor who takes her as his last patient. Ralph Bellamy guest stars

programme.title: The Children Nobody Wanted
programme.desc: A man saddened by the plight of orphaned children resolves to do all he can to relieve their suffering, so sets out to become the first unmarried foster parent in America. Fact-based drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Frederic Lehne, Noble Willingham and Matt Clark

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark spend Christmas trying to show a crooked car salesman the error of his ways

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps Mark to find an old friend who has been missing for five days, but finds nobody is willing to talk about him

programme.title: Love Finds a Home
programme.desc: A female doctor in a small 19th-century town looks after a friend in the last stages of pregnancy, but finds herself continually at odds with her patient's mother-in-law, who believes in homeopathic treatments. The doctor also has to contend with her daughter's first love and her own inability to conceive. Period drama sequel, based on Janette Oke's novel, starring Sarah Jones and Haylie Duff

programme.title: Heart of a Child
programme.desc: The longed-for pregnancies of two women hit complications, and doctors face a race against time to save the unborn children. Fact-based drama, starring Ann Jillian, Michelle Greene, Terry O'Quinn, Bruce Greenwood and Andrew Wheeler

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student, but her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for the new town doctor

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles Ingalls leads the blind children to their new school and Mrs Oleson's racial prejudices land her in trouble. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part two of three. Freddie and Jock join forces in the fruit flying business, while Bruno could soon be tasting his just desserts. Drama, starring Michael York and Lucy Gutteridge

programme.title: North and South
programme.sub-title: North and South: Book II: Love and War.
programme.desc: Romantic drama, based on the novel by John Jakes and set during the American Civil War, which drives a moral wedge between two life-long friends as their country is torn apart

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John -Boy has heard nothing from the publisher whom he sent his book, so goes to new York to find out if it is going to be printed(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter's father causes problems when he arrives in Walnut Grove and tries to persuade his family to give up the simple life and enjoy a luxurious existence in New York(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Isaiah Edwards is mistakenly identified as part of an outlaw gang when the infamous Younger brothers are released from prison and set about rebuilding their reputation(n)

programme.title: Heart of a Child
programme.desc: The longed-for pregnancies of two women hit complications, and doctors face a race against time to save the unborn children. Fact-based drama, starring Ann Jillian, Michelle Greene, Terry O'Quinn, Bruce Greenwood and Andrew Wheeler(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan falls in love with a woman he is trying to matchmake with another man, and Mark tries to persuade him to put his own happiness first for a change(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: God grants Mark the chance to go back in time and tell his now deceased grandfather that he loved him(n)

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman(n)

programme.title: A Son's Promise
programme.desc: A 15-year-old boy promises his dying mother that he will look after his six younger brothers and keep them together as a family. Drama, starring Ricky Schroder, David Andrews and Veronica Cartwright(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy raises money to save his newspaper by selling his land to a mining company, unaware of the damage the new owners will do to the environment(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Carrie becomes heartsick for her father when he and Jonathan take jobs on a telephone crew and must be away for weeks, so invents an invisible friend(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario(n)

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff(n)

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part three of three. The war is over and the de Lancel's have seen their share of tragedy. Drama, starring Michael York and Lucy Gutteridge(n)

The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part two of three. Freddie and Jock join forces in the fruit flying business, while Bruno could soon be tasting his just desserts. Drama, starring Michael York and Lucy Gutteridge

programme.title: North and South
programme.sub-title: North and South: Book II: Love and War.
programme.desc: Romantic drama, based on the novel by John Jakes and set during the American Civil War, which drives a moral wedge between two life-long friends as their country is torn apart

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John -Boy has heard nothing from the publisher whom he sent his book, so goes to new York to find out if it is going to be printed(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter's father causes problems when he arrives in Walnut Grove and tries to persuade his family to give up the simple life and enjoy a luxurious existence in New York(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Isaiah Edwards is mistakenly identified as part of an outlaw gang when the infamous Younger brothers are released from prison and set about rebuilding their reputation(n)

programme.title: Heart of a Child
programme.desc: The longed-for pregnancies of two women hit complications, and doctors face a race against time to save the unborn children. Fact-based drama, starring Ann Jillian, Michelle Greene, Terry O'Quinn, Bruce Greenwood and Andrew Wheeler(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan falls in love with a woman he is trying to matchmake with another man, and Mark tries to persuade him to put his own happiness first for a change(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: God grants Mark the chance to go back in time and tell his now deceased grandfather that he loved him(n)

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman(n)

programme.title: A Son's Promise
programme.desc: A 15-year-old boy promises his dying mother that he will look after his six younger brothers and keep them together as a family. Drama, starring Ricky Schroder, David Andrews and Veronica Cartwright(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy raises money to save his newspaper by selling his land to a mining company, unaware of the damage the new owners will do to the environment(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Carrie becomes heartsick for her father when he and Jonathan take jobs on a telephone crew and must be away for weeks, so invents an invisible friend(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario(n)

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff(n)

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part three of three. The war is over and the de Lancel's have seen their share of tragedy. Drama, starring Michael York and Lucy Gutteridge(n)

programme.sub-title: North and South: Book II: Love and War.
programme.desc: Romantic drama, based on the novel by John Jakes and set during the American Civil War, which drives a moral wedge between two life-long friends as their country is torn apart(n)

programme.desc: The stand-ups at L.A.'s primo comedy club, run by the formidable Goldie, react to rising star Clay Appuzzo's big appearance on 'The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson' in unexpected ways. Comics Cassie and Bill are most affected. Eager to join L.A.'s burgeoning comedy scene, Boston transplants Eddie and Ron are surprised by their unorthodox accommodations and young up-and-comer Adam is forced into a compromising situation by his manager Carl.
